com.agorapulse.worker.annotation

Annotation Type Job


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={METHOD,ANNOTATION_TYPE})
 @Executable(processOnStartup=true)
 @Parallel
public @interface Job
    Distributed version of io.micronaut.scheduling.annotation.Scheduled.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String cron 
      java.lang.String fixedDelay
      A String representation of the Duration between the time of the last execution and the beginning of the next.
      java.lang.String fixedRate
      A String representation of the Duration between executions.
      java.lang.String initialDelay
      A String representation of the Duration before starting executions.
      java.lang.String scheduler 
      java.lang.String value
      Allows to override the default name of the job which is JobClassName if there is only one executable method (e.g.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.String value
        Allows to override the default name of the job which is JobClassName if there is only one executable method (e.g. job definition) in the class or JobClassName-methodName if there is more then one executable method in the class. Either the job name specified here or the default name is converted using NameUtils.hyphenate(String).
        Returns:
        the name of the job used for configuration
        Default:
        ""

      • cron

        public abstract java.lang.String cron
        Returns:
        The CRON expression
        Default:
        ""

      • fixedDelay

        public abstract java.lang.String fixedDelay
        A String representation of the Duration between the time of the last execution and the beginning of the next. For example 10m == 10 minutes
        Returns:
        The fixed delay
        Default:
        ""

      • initialDelay

        public abstract java.lang.String initialDelay
        A String representation of the Duration before starting executions. For example 10m == 10 minutes
        Returns:
        The fixed delay
        Default:
        ""

      • fixedRate

        public abstract java.lang.String fixedRate
        A String representation of the Duration between executions. For example 10m == 10 minutes
        Returns:
        The fixed rate
        Default:
        ""

      • scheduler

        public abstract java.lang.String scheduler
        Returns:
        The name of a Named bean that is a ScheduledExecutorService to use to schedule the task
        Default:
        "scheduled"
